localChanges: Ensure all assets are loaded before trying to use the curosr.
Only focus the `<select/>` in a `SelectionWindow` if there is more than one item.

log: Add `Map` class and `extractMap` script to convert Civ 1 `*.MAP` (or `MAP.PIC`) files to RLE representations.
Refactor `Earth` start `Tile`s to use the `Regitry` mechanism.
Simplify `World` built `Rule` by breaking out into `Spawn` and `PickStartTile` `Rule`s.
Add support for `Earth` `Generator` and fixed start `Tile`s associated.
Add `Spawn` `Rule` to control what happens when a `Player` is spawned into the game.
Add `PickGenerator` (to choose the `Generator` to build the `World` map) and `PickStartTile` (to choose the starting `Tile`s for the `Player`) `Rule`s.
Add hard-coded check for `Earth` map to ensure first `City` is built in the right place.
